name: Cooking with Belmont
description:
Throw a dinner party with your disaster chef boyfriend! ~No bad endings, only bad cooking~

It’s Merritt's friend’s birthday, and he’s promised to deliver a mind-blowing dinner party.  To pull off a great meal, all Merritt has to do is keep his disaster boyfriend Belmont out of the kitchen.  Sounds easy enough, right?

Crime boss Belmont has never cooked a meal he hasn’t mangled—or poisoned.  But he’s a great boyfriend, and he knows Merritt has bitten off more than he can chew.  He wants to help.

What if cooking with Belmont could make Merritt's meal, and his night, even better? Will they make amazing food, or commit a culinary crime?

Good food or bad, it’ll be a night to remember.

Features:

  • 3 routes, 7 outcomes, 10 achievements
  • Blinking, talking, cooking, and additional sprite animations
  • 45-75 minutes per play-through, about 3 hours total play time
  • 3  illustrated romantic scenes to unlock
  • 14 CG illustrations, 7 backgrounds, 7 additional illustrations
  • Extras: Achievements, BG Gallery, CG Gallery, Creator Notes

Warnings:

  • This game is recommended for ages 17 and older. [Strong Language][Mature Humor][Sexual Content][Sexual Themes][Alcohol Reference]
  • Includes some beeping alarms, breaking dishes, explosions
  • Includes two single screen flashes
  • Note to Streamers: This game includes licensed music that isn’t cleared for third party streaming. Music can be turned off in Settings.

Cooking with Belmont has a channel in the Demon of the Underground Discord!
